Package jackstockley.addressbookcli

Class AddressBook

java.lang.Object
jackstockley.addressbookcli.AddressBook
public class AddressBook
extends java.lang.Object
This program allows a user to interact with an address book that is saved on a MySQL database over the Internet!
Version:
2.6
Author:
jnstockley

    • connectionHandler

      public int connectionHandler​(java.io.BufferedReader reader)
      Helps manage which type of connection or action the user wants to make when starting the program
      Parameters:
      reader - How I am reading data from the console
      Returns:
      An integer corresponding to which action the user wants to make

    • selector

      public java.util.List<java.lang.String> selector​(java.io.BufferedReader reader, java.sql.Connection conn)
      Allows the user to select which table and method they want to perform
      Parameters:
      reader - How I am reading data from the console
      conn - The MySQL connection
      Returns:
      A list of strings with the table and method to perform

    • getTable

      public java.lang.String getTable​(java.io.BufferedReader reader, java.sql.Connection conn)
      Allows the user to select which table they want to interact with
      Parameters:
      reader - How I am reading data from the console
      conn - The MySQL connection
      Returns:
      A string corresponding to which table the user wants to interact with

    • getMethod

      public java.lang.String getMethod​(java.io.BufferedReader reader, java.lang.String table, java.sql.Connection conn)
      Allows the user to select which method they want to interact with the selected table with
      Parameters:
      reader - How I am reading data from the console
      table - The table the user wants to interact with
      conn - THe MySQL connection
      Returns:
      A string corresponding to which method the user wants to interact with on the selected table

    • printTable

      public void printTable​(java.sql.Connection conn, java.lang.String table, java.lang.String method, java.io.BufferedReader reader)
      The main function of the program. Interacts with helper classes and performs the user selected action on the database
      Parameters:
      conn - The MySQL connection
      table - The user selected table
      method - The user selected method
      reader - How I am reading data from the console
